Description: Fragment of round handle of an Apulian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine light red-brown. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 128, 5. P. Palazzo, Le anfore di Apani (Brindisi), Rome 2013, 140,
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1257)
